column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////We had higher expectation for this place since it has high rating and lots of our friends had recommended this place. The wait is long but while you wait
column2: you can order your food and they said that they'll time it so by the time you sit down
column3: your pizza should get to you. However this was not the case. I waited an hour to be seated and another 30 mins to get the food.
